author: Robert Barnes, Robert Barnes
title: Coronavirus: Texas abortion restrictions can stay in place, appeals court rules
description: State is exploiting crisis to ban abortion, critics argue
content:
Texas can continue its restrictions on abortion during the coronavirus pandemic, a divided federal appeals court ruled on Tuesday, in a decision likely to make its way to the Supreme Court.
A panel of the US Court of Appeals granted what it acknowledged was … [+26856 chars]
